<format file="Math" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_DOUBLEABS/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*DoMathAbs\(.*,1\)\s*[^%>]*%>" formattype="1" func="abs" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_DOUBLEABS"/> <format file="Math" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_FLOATABS/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*DoMathAbs\(.*,2\)\s*[^%>]*%>" formattype="2" func="abs" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_FLOATABS"/> <format file="Math" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_INTEGEABS/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*DoMathAbs\(.*,3\)\s*[^%>]*%>" formattype="3" func="abs" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_INTEGEABS"/> <format file="Math" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_LONGABS/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*DoMathAbs\(.*,4\)\s*[^%>]*%>" formattype="4" func="abs" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_LONGABS"/> <format file="Math" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_DOUBLEROUND/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*DoMathRound\(.*,1\)\s*[^%>]*%>" formattype="1" func="round" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_DOUBLEROUND"/> <format file="Math" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_FLOATROUND/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*DoMathRound\(.*,2\)\s*[^%>]*%>" formattype="2" func="round" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_FLOATROUND"/>
<format file="General" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_URLENCODE/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*response\.encodeURL\(.*\)\s*[^%>]*%>" func="response.encodeURL" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_URLENCODE" /> <format file="General" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_SERVERPATH/format/title" expression="<%\s*=.*getServletConfig\(\)\.getServletContext\(\).\getRealPath\(.*\)\s*[^%>]*%>" func="getServletConfig().getServletContext().getRealPath" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_SERVERPATH"/> <format file="FirstRSstat" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_FIRSTREC/format/title" visibility="hidden" expression="<%\s*=\s*\(\s*\w+_first\s*\)\s*%>" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_FIRSTREC" /> <format file="LastRSstat" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_LASTREC/format/title" visibility="hidden" expression="<%\s*=\s*\(\s*\w+_last\s*\)\s*%>" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_LASTREC" /> <format file="TotalRSstat" MMString:title="ServerFormats/JSP/Formats/DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_TOTALREC/format/title" visibility="hidden" expression="<%\s*=\s*\(\s*\w+_total\s*\)\s*%>" id="DWMenu_ServerFormatDef_JSP_1_TOTALREC" />
